## Helper.toArray variable

Converts value to an array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toArray: {
    <T>(value: lodash.Dictionary<T> | lodash.NumericDictionary<T> | null | undefined): T[];
    <T>(value: T): Array<T[keyof T]>;
    (): any[];
}
```
